availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joel M. Smith (Clark County, Indiana, justice of the peace)

body.p: Clark County, Indiana, justice of the peace. New York native. Married to Martha Smith. Father of William Smith. Resident of Clark County, Indiana, in 1850. Justice of the peace in Clark County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Charlestown, p. 92A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Charlestown Township, p. 153.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Indiana, Clark County, Charlestown, p. 367B.
"Joel M. Smith (1813-1871)," Find A Grave, Memorial 10817386, accessed June 26, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/10817386.
